body: Hello, I recently updated the Honeybee and Ladybug modules for Github. In running the 'Honeybee_Run DaylightSimulation' module I encountered a problem. It runs fine when using grid-based analysis recipes. When using an annual based recipe (DAYSIM) run, I receive an error: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/2WnXz*FVOuGtFF1iD942bmF8Wq6W-Ori59IOptN9-C7tZ9r-6rgvogTU9ZwKjceH*nGVGcOiYtjFRkuPqaB9gvCTl2cks69E/Error.PNG) This module had worked previously before the most recent update. Perhaps there is a bug with one of the updated modules? Please let me know your thoughts. Thank you, Reinhardt
topic: Possible Bug - New Honeybee Run Daylight Simulation Module - 03.16.15
